languages.text: "Последний восход!" {n}— с яростью говорит Арджента.{/n} "Мы недоразгадали планы врага... о Император, прости нам это небрежение. Клянусь, мы найдем способ исправить его!"
"The Final Dawn!" {n}Argenta says furiously.{/n} "We stopped short of puzzling out the enemy's entire plan... O Emperor, forgive us for this negligence. I swear we will find a way to right it!"
languages.original_text: "Последний восход!" {n}— с яростью говорит Арджента.{/n} "Мы недоразгадали планы врага... о Император, прости нам это небрежение. Клянусь, мы найдем способ исправить его!"

traits.locale_text: "The Final Dawn!" {n}Argenta says furiously.{/n} "We stopped short of puzzling out the enemy's entire plan... O Emperor, forgive us for this negligence. I swear we will find a way to make up for it!"
"The Final Dawn!" {n}Argenta says furiously.{/n} "We stopped short of puzzling out the enemy's entire plan... O Emperor, forgive us for this negligence. I swear we will find a way to make up for it!"
"The Final Dawn!" {n}Argenta says furiously.{/n} "We stopped short of puzzling out the enemy's entire plan... O Emperor, forgive us for this negligence. I swear we will find a way to right it!"
"The Final Dawn!" {n}Argenta says furiously.{/n} "We stopped short of puzzling out the enemy's entire plan... O Emperor, forgive us for this negligence. I swear we will find a way to right it!"
"The Final Dawn!" {n}Argenta says furiously.{/n} "We stopped short of puzzling out the enemy's entire plan... O Emperor, forgive us for this negligence. I swear we will find a way to right it!"
"The Final Dawn!" {n}Argenta says furiously.{/n} "We stopped short of puzzling out the enemy's entire plan... O Emperor, forgive us for this negligence. I swear we will find a way to right it!"

languages.text: "Die Letzte Dämmerung!" {n}Argenta spuckt die Worte wütend aus.{/n} "Wir haben nicht den gesamten Plan des Feindes ausgetüftelt ... O Imperator, vergib uns diese Nachlässigkeit. Ich schwöre, wir werden einen Weg finden, das wiedergutzumachen!"
languages.original_text: "The Final Dawn!" {n}Argenta says furiously.{/n} "We stopped short of puzzling out the enemy's entire plan... O Emperor, forgive us for this negligence. I swear we will find a way to right it!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Letzte Dämmerung!" {n}Argenta spuckt die Worte wütend aus.{/n} "Wir haben nicht den gesamten Plan des Feindes ausgetüftelt ... O Imperator, vergib uns diese Nachlässigkeit. Ich schwöre, wir werden einen Weg finden, das wiedergutzumachen!"

languages.text: « L'Aube finale ! {n}hurle Argenta avec fureur.{/n} Nous n'avons pas pris toute la mesure du plan de l'ennemi... Ô Empereur, pardonnez-nous cette négligence. Je jure que nous trouverons un moyen de tout arranger ! »
languages.original_text: "The Final Dawn!" {n}Argenta says furiously.{/n} "We stopped short of puzzling out the enemy's entire plan... O Emperor, forgive us for this negligence. I swear we will find a way to right it!"

traits.locale_text: « L'Aube finale ! {n}hurle Argenta avec fureur.{/n} Nous n'avons pas pris toute la mesure du plan de l'ennemi... Ô Empereur, pardonnez-nous cette négligence. Je jure que nous trouverons un moyen de tout arranger ! »

languages.text: “是终末黎明！”{n}阿洁塔愤怒地吼道。{/n}“我们没能弄清敌人的全盘计划，就差一步……噢，帝皇啊，请原谅我们的疏忽。我发誓，我们会找到解决之道！”
languages.original_text: "The Final Dawn!" {n}Argenta says furiously.{/n} "We stopped short of puzzling out the enemy's entire plan... O Emperor, forgive us for this negligence. I swear we will find a way to right it!"

traits.locale_text: “是终末黎明！”{n}阿洁塔愤怒地吼道。{/n}“我们没能弄清敌人的全盘计划，就差一步……噢，帝皇啊，请原谅我们的疏忽。我发誓，我们会找到解决之道！”

languages.text: 「最後の夜明け！」{n}アルジェンタは怒りを込めて言った。{/n}「敵の計画全体を解き明かす直前に止まってしまいました…おお、皇帝よ、この怠慢をお許しください。誓いましょう、何とかして正す方法を見つけてみせます！」
languages.original_text: "The Final Dawn!" {n}Argenta says furiously.{/n} "We stopped short of puzzling out the enemy's entire plan... O Emperor, forgive us for this negligence. I swear we will find a way to right it!"

traits.locale_text: 「最後の夜明け！」{n}アルジェンタは怒りを込めて言った。{/n}「敵の計画全体を解き明かす寸前で止まってしまいました…おお、皇帝よ、この怠慢をお許しください。誓いましょう、何とかして正す方法を見つけてみせます！」

languages.text: «¡El Amanecer Final!». {n}Dice furiosamente Argenta.{/n} «No llegamos a averiguar todo el plan del enemigo... Oh Emperador, perdónanos por este error. Juro que encontraremos la manera de arreglarlo».
languages.original_text: "The Final Dawn!" {n}Argenta says furiously.{/n} "We stopped short of puzzling out the enemy's entire plan... O Emperor, forgive us for this negligence. I swear we will find a way to right it!"

traits.locale_text: «¡El Amanecer Final!». {n}Dice furiosamente Argenta.{/n} «No llegamos a averiguar todo el plan del enemigo... Oh Emperador, perdónanos por este error. Juro que encontraremos la manera de arreglarlo».

languages.text: "Nihai Şafak!" {n}Argenta öfkeyle haykırıyor.{/n} "Düşmanın tertibini görmekte yetersiz kaldık. Ey İmparator, bu ihmalkârlığımızı bağışla. Yeminim olsun, telafi edeceğiz!"
languages.original_text: "The Final Dawn!" {n}Argenta says furiously.{/n} "We stopped short of puzzling out the enemy's entire plan... O Emperor, forgive us for this negligence. I swear we will find a way to right it!"

traits.locale_text: "Nihai Şafak!" {n}Argenta öfkeyle haykırıyor.{/n} "Düşmanın tertibini tamamen çözümleyememişiz... Ey İmparator, bu ihmalkârlığımızı bağışla. Telafisi için elimizden geleni yapacağız!"
